messages.subject: Re: Hey, List
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/06/2001 7:25:50 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... I am reminded of my partner s description of being in Quaker meeting.  There, if someone
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/06/2001 7:25:50 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> So maybe this great unmonitored experiment of a list has failed,
> after all. What do you think?
>
>

I am reminded of my partner's description of being in Quaker meeting. There,
if someone acted inappropriately, they were quietly taken aside by a
respected "elder" of the meeting and spoken to, gently and lovingly, but
firmly. It was called being "eldered."

Rather than being moderated, maybe this is what we need.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
